channel.title: Whats the opposite of && and ||?
channel.description: Whats the opposite of && and || because I'm making a command to work for other people and not me. Someone help. I though it would be "-" or something.

item.title: Whats the opposite of && and ||?
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:3, topic:164858”]If you want it for other people but not you, try
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“spam”) && !playerName.equals(“urname”)) {
sendMessage(“NOSPAM”);
}[/quote]

Hahahaha, lol’d at your example.

Read full topic

item.title: Whats the opposite of && and ||?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

If you want it for other people but not you, try
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“spam”) && !playerName.equals(“urname”)) {
sendMessage(“NOSPAM”);
}

item.title: Whats the opposite of && and ||?
item.dc:creator: @H20wnage H20wnage
item.description:
@H20wnage wrote:

u mean like a command that dont work for some people and works for other or dont work aginst u but works on others like ip ban u can make it so they cant ipban ur account by adding like ignorecase(“uber admin”) send message(“u cant ip ban server owner”);
